name: LD41 Space Garden
description:
LD41 Space Garden

Survival and Gardening on the space ship.

“Back in the days, when stars were young…Space plants where used to produce all needed resources for the space travel… Skillful gardener robots where used to care for this rare plants.

Many light years passed since then…

And only one spaceship left roaming the unknown deep space in search of new discoveries and plant species.”
